attributes.action: express our unhappiness with the failure of the Government’s recent National Strategy for Carers to immediately address the issue of carers’ benefits. As Carers from North Tyneside we petition the Government to radically transform carers’ benefits and significantly increase the financial support they receive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
